song.englishname: Your Tongue Is the Deadliest of Arrows

english.segment1: Possessed by the pawn. Affect a secret smile. Challenge your poison. Your vigor is my trial. Weary when you wait. executive degree, process to restrain. The fate you have for me.
english.segment2: You make sure what you're running to. You made sure what you're running from. Forces divine, they'll grow weak in time.
english.segment3: The treasure we both came to find. Don't separate what falls in line.
english.segment4: Your tongue is like a fire. Wish I could contain. With sharpened, poison words. I walk into this flame. Tinted by your ruse. Accustomed to your schemes. With wile and detriment. And still I let you be.
